name: @jsquash/resize
description: Wasm image resize methods supporting the browser and V8 environments. Repackaged from Squoosh App.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r lib package.json README.md .npmignore ../../LICENSE dist && (rm dist/lib/*/pkg/package.json dist/lib/*/pkg/.gitignore || true)
scripts.prepublishOnly: [[ "$PWD" == *'/dist' ]] && exit 0 || (echo 'Please run npm publish from the dist directory' && exit 1)
